snippet: The Spaniard Tommy Robredo’s ability to comeback from two sets down against his more powerful countryman Nicolas Almagro lies in large part in his remarkable match temperament.
abstract: The Spaniard Tommy Robredo’s ability to comeback from two sets down against his more powerful countryman Nicolas Almagro lies in large part in his remarkable match temperament.

headline.main: Robredo Remains Focused, and Stays Alive at Roland Garros
